page.title: 01AN OVERVIEW - PAISLEY
page.content:
The impression gained of the block is that it consists of housing interspersed with light industry e.g Hillington Industrial Estate (5286). A notable feature is that in the middle of this is arable farm land in Arkleston broken only by the inclusion of the cemetery and further south by Barshaw Park and Golf Course. These are just two of several open spaces.
The block offers a variety of housing types, shopping, education and recrea- tion facilities to the inhabitants, locally known as Paisley Buddies. A sample of life as it is in l986 is contained in the following pages.
